data.eml:eml: Opsarius putaoensis, a new species of subfamily Danioninae (Actinopterygii, Cyprinidae) from the Irrawaddy River basin in northern Myanmar

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Qin, Tao, Maung, Kyaw Win, Chen, Xiao-Yong (2019): Opsarius putaoensis, a new species of subfamily Danioninae (Actinopterygii, Cyprinidae) from the Irrawaddy River basin in northern Myanmar. Zootaxa 4615 (3): 585-593, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4615.3.11
